hymn.title: The Teaching of the Divine Anointing

lyrics.stanza: And as for you, The anointing which you have received From Him abides in you, and you have no need That anyone teach you; But as His anointing teaches you Concerning all things and is true And is not a lie, And even as it has taught you, Abide in Him, Abide in Him.
